name: Thanks for all of the feedback on my Logic Pro conundrum! I've now learned about Hindenburg and Reaper as alternatives. Honestly, Garage Band isn't all that bad, but its missing two things I'd like from Logic: chapter markers and "drop silence."

content.html: Thanks for all of the feedback on my Logic Pro conundrum! I've now learned about Hindenburg and Reaper as alternatives. Honestly, Garage Band isn't all that bad, but its missing two things I'd like from Logic: chapter markers and "drop silence."
